connector.description: Receive data from an Apache Artemis message broker by using JMS Pooled Connection.

camel.kamelet.jms-pooled-apache-artemis-.name: camel.kamelet.jms-pooled-apache-artemis-source.destinationType
camel.kamelet.jms-pooled-apache-artemis-.description: The JMS destination type (queue or topic).

camel.kamelet.jms-pooled-apache-artemis-.name: camel.kamelet.jms-pooled-apache-artemis-source.maxSessionsPerConnection
camel.kamelet.jms-pooled-apache-artemis-.description: The maximum number of pooled sessions per connection in the pool

camel.kamelet.jms-pooled-apache-artemis-.name: camel.kamelet.jms-pooled-apache-artemis-source.maxIdleSessionsPerConnection
camel.kamelet.jms-pooled-apache-artemis-.description: The number of idle sessions allowed per connection before they are closed.

camel.kamelet.jms-pooled-apache-artemis-.name: camel.kamelet.jms-pooled-apache-artemis-source.connectionIdleTimeout
camel.kamelet.jms-pooled-apache-artemis-.description: The maximum time a pooled Connection can sit unused before it is eligible for removal (in milliseconds)
